Air Elemental.name: Whirlwind
Air Elemental.text: The Air Elemental slings a growing tornado that swallows you whole.

Barbed Devil.name: Hurl Flame
Barbed Devil.text: The Devil launches a napalm fireball that engulfs you in flames.

Bulette.name: Deadly Leap
Bulette.text: The Bulette leaps into the air and lands on you with an earth shattering smash.

Earth Elemental.name: Graviton Slam
Earth Elemental.text: Two rocks are summoned and swiftly collapsed, smashing you between them.

Fire Elemental.name: Fire Whirlwind
Fire Elemental.text: It's a fire tornado. Obviously it really hurts.

Flesh Golem.name: Desecrated
Flesh Golem.text: The abomination grapples you, bleeding all matter of disease infested blood upon you.

Giant Crocodile.name: Death Spin
Giant Crocodile.text: The Giant Crocodile snaps onto you and enters a death spiral with your remains.

Gorgon.name: Gorgon
Gorgon.text: And you thought it was a snake lady...

Hill Giant.name: Giant Hurl
Hill Giant.text: The massive creature picks you up and launches you across the barren wasteland

Night Hag.name: Nightmare Projection
Night Hag.text: The Hag gets a cold bony finger onto your head, filling it with wretched unimaginable nightmares.

Otyugh.name: Tentacle Slam
Otyugh.text: You are caught by the thousands of needles on the Otyugh tentacle and consequently slammed.

Roper.name: Reel
Roper.text: The Roper whips a slimy tendril around you and pulls you into its gaping, tooth-filled maw.

Salamander.name: Ignited Spear
Salamander.text: A spear is launched forward, slamming into your body and exploding in a ball of flames.

Shambling Mound.name: Engulf
Shambling Mound.text: You become one with nature. Literally.

Troll.name: Devious Strike
Troll.text: As you cut off the Troll's arm, a new arm instantly regenerates with even sharper claws.

Unicorn.name: Gore
Unicorn.text: The Unicorn charges you, impaling you upon its majestic horn.

Vampire Spawn.name: Engorge Blood
Vampire Spawn.text: The Spawn bites into your neck, drawing your blood at 'breakneck' speed

Water Elemental.name: Hydro Funnel
Water Elemental.text: The floor is flooded and swiftly turns into a torrential maelstrom.

Werebear.name: Devour
Werebear.text: The Werebear eats you. Literally eats you.

Wraith.name: Spectral Chains
Wraith.text: You become encased in hundreds of links of cool unbreakable spectral chains as the Wraith descends closer...

Xorn.name: Stealth Maw
Xorn.text: You take a step across a rocky chasm, only to fall into the waiting mouth of a flesh hungry Xorn.
